recipesJson.name: Pink and Blue GOO
recipesJson.author: MixinDAD
recipesJson.description: Blue Raspberry and Strawberry taffy. I have been in love with FW salt water taffy lately and this is that love child. Try this mix from fresh to a week because the flavors all make there appearance in the front till day 7 when you get a chewy sweet strawberry taffy with blue raspberry swirls.

reviews.text: Wow this is amazing best Taffy flavor i've tried to date well done great use of CAP blue raspberry cotton candy taste is amazing right from the get.
